Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. This innovative solution is designed to streamline processes, increase efficiency, and ultimately contribute to your bottom line. Given its unique capabilities and market positioning, we estimate its true worth to be well above $1000000. To make this opportunity more attractive, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, leveraging our confidence in its ability to deliver exceptional returns on investment for your organization. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a game-changer for your business. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
